title: Blended Learning Course for Acquiring Elementary Mathematics Intervention Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and basic awareness of educational settings
context.additional_context: A course focused on acquiring elementary mathematics intervention techniques for pre-service teachers and education job seekers, conducted through smartphone-based learning activities in limited technological environments

learning_goals: Cultivation of the ability to design three or more mathematics intervention strategies applicable in small-group learning environments.
Development of five or more foundational number concept activity materials for elementary students experiencing persistent math difficulties.
Acquisition of the ability to create and utilize two or more formative assessment tools when operating a 20-week intervention program.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
